isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Diesel Engine Diagnostic Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Diagnostic Tools and Accessories - Tools and Accessories - ICP System Test Adapter

svcproc.title: ICP System Test Adapter
svcproc.para: The Injection Control Pressure (ICP) System Test Adapter was first used to pressurize the ICP system for the International® VT 365 diesel engine to test ICP system integrity with the influence of the Injection Pressure Regulator (IPR) valve. This adapter is used to take an oil sample or measure oil pressure at the Engine Oil Temperature (EOT) sensor port for the International® DT 466, DT 570, and HT 570 diesel engine.
